General.Name: AViTA Corporation
General.Description: AViTA Corporation manufactures and sells home healthcare products for clinical and personal use. The company offers various OEM/ODM solutions. Its products include non-contact and infrared/forehead thermometers, arm and wrist type blood pressure monitors, and electronic lice combs. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.78, Kwang-Fu Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24158
